caseTitle: Hafiz Malik Kamran Akbar, etc v. Muhammad Shaif (deceased) through LRs, etc
tagline: Discussion: (1) The Court is not obligated to frame issues in every case while deciding application under section 12(2), C.P.C. (2) Distinction between Order 9 Rule 13 and Section 12 (2) C.P.C. (3) Full particulars of fraud, misrepresentation or want of jurisdiction should be mentioned in the application and not vague allegations.
